message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $100 to me, but I understand its value may be different to you. To start, I'll offer it to you for $95. Let me know if this works for you!
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $95 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested, but I'd be willing to pay around $65 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. I would like to counter by suggesting $80 for the product. This aligns closer to my valuation while still providing you with a good deal.
